sendOrRequestDescription: Send money directly to another user or request money from them. Choose your option below.
recipientMustHaveAccount: The recipient must have an account in the system
chooseAccount: Choose which account to send money from
amountRequesting: Amount you are requesting from the recipient
amountDeducted: Amount will be deducted from your account balance
notesPlaceholder: Add a message for the recipient
successRequest: Money request submitted successfully! The recipient will be notified and can approve or reject your request.
successSend: Money sent successfully! The transfer has been completed.
